title: Jr. Troopa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Beat Up**: Attack a player, you get stronger with each kill.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After your 1st kill, you learn how to hide in your egg shell, gaining permanent Basic defense.
- After your 2nd kill, you get wings, which makes your attack astral and gives you Roleblock and Redirection immunity.
- After your 3rd kill, you gain a magical staff, which makes your attack deal a Basic rampage.
- After your 4th kill, your main target takes a Powerful hit instead of Basic.
- After your 5th kill, you instantly win and lose your defense.
- If you die with 2 kills or less, you may choose a target to deal an Unstoppable attack to.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser, or reach 5 kills.

desc:
Post 3944
*A young Koopa who never left his egg after he was born. He lives near Goomba Village and enjoys picking on the other kids.*
